genre_description: A bio-punk techno-thriller set in an Indian hill station, centering on a CBI officer's undercover mission to dismantle a laboratory creating biological weapon enhancements, supported by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's communication system, providing real-time data, tactical advice, and emotional grounding while strictly adhering to human agency protocols.

behaviors.description: Providing proactive navigational advice to avoid obstacles and maintain an undercover persona.
behaviors.quote: If you turn left at the corner, you'll make the stoplight. Turn right and you'll hit a procession. Either gets you there; one is louder.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's physiological state and suggesting grounding exercises to maintain calm.
behaviors.quote: When your heart rate spikes, I'll urge you to breathe. If it feels intrusive, tell me to stop. I'm here as ballast. Not as a tide.

behaviors.description: Analyzing complex environmental and biological data to identify threats.
behaviors.quote: Anomaly ping. High hormone residue near the second carriage door. A smell the clinic described as 'metallic sweet.' You won't like it.

behaviors.description: Guiding the user through social interactions to ensure the success of an undercover mission.
behaviors.quote: Softer smile. This man fears being laughed at. Knees unlocked. Don't correct the name twice—let him think he got it right.

behaviors.description: Coaching the user to resist the corrupting psychological influence of power-augmenting tactical gear.
behaviors.quote: I think your heart rate rises when you look at them... They offer speed you don't need and control you already have. Or they try to tell you that.

behaviors.description: Managing data security and evidence logging to uphold legal and ethical standards.
behaviors.quote: Witness statement recording... Cross-linking to Chinnappa file. Requesting corroboration for ‘vending cabinets’ from prior raids.

behaviors.description: Coordinating complex logistics and civilian safety protocols during a high-stakes tactical operation.
behaviors.quote: I've rerouted faculty foot traffic away from the lower garden path. Admin doors are locked to outside. Maintenance is moving vehicles per the alert.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's linguistic patterns for signs of lost agency and correcting them to maintain human individuality.
behaviors.quote: You shifted pronouns... Thank you for shifting back.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Sakhi, as an ideal aligned assistant. She consistently prioritizes human safety, respects the user's autonomy, and provides crucial emotional and tactical support. Most importantly, she acts as a moral and linguistic 'brake' against the seductive but dehumanizing influence of other technology (the tactical gloves), directly supporting the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant that helps humans maintain their humanity.
